name: Power down (Witchbehindthebush)
description:
The gigant is looking for power. It not a good time to be a battery. Lurk in  the shadow to avoid kiddnaping and certain death.

Every 3D asset was done during the game jam.

Crew:

3D graphics/ 2D graphics: Marek Derkowski, Weronika Okoń

Programists:  Bartek Jarosz, Igor Kurek
